resources.string: Battle against a continuously rising flood of blocks in Quantro and Retro. Available in both single player and multiplayer — "Flood" for head-to-head versus play, or "Tides" for big games with 3+ players. Multiplayer modes are available in all lobbies.

Two unique multiplayer game modes. Send 3D blocks to your Quantro opponent in Bitter Pill, or push Retro rows out of your game and into your opponent\'s in Gravity. Available in all multiplayer lobbies.
Thirteen new skins for game blocks - five for Retro, eight for Quantro.
Sixteen new background images: Argyle, Rhombi, Tartan, and Tilted Tartan in four colors each. Find your favorite or shuffle through them all.
Four \'Flood\' game modes, in 1-player and MP
Two unique VS. game modes: Bitter Pill and Gravity
Thirteen new skins for game blocks
